response.original_title: In this hot desert I miss the snow
response.overview: In this hot desert I miss the snow (2018) by Evy Jokhova, emerges from the artistâ€™s personal relationship with the Caucasus and examines the deep connections between land, rituals, society and intimate narratives, refecting also the yearning for a reconnection with one's culture of origin and family history.
response.title: In this hot desert I miss the snow
